Submodules¶

mosekTools.solver.solver module¶

mosekTools.solver.solver.lasso(matrix, rhs, lamb)[source]¶

min 2-norm (matrix*w - rhs)^2 + lamb * 1-norm(w)

mosekTools.solver.solver.lsq_pos(matrix, rhs)[source]¶

min 2-norm (matrix*w - rhs)^2 s.t. e’w = 1

w >= 0
mosekTools.solver.solver.lsq_pos_l1_penalty(matrix, rhs, cost_multiplier, weights_0)[source]¶

min 2-norm (matrix*w - rhs)** + 1-norm(cost_multiplier*(w-w0)) s.t. e’w = 1

w >= 0
mosekTools.solver.solver.markowitz(exp_ret, covariance_mat, aversion)[source]¶
mosekTools.solver.solver.markowitz_riskobjective(exp_ret, covariance_mat, bound)[source]¶
